title: Organisation Looking for Managers
body:
Paragon eSports is looking for a dedicated manager to help the organisation with everything the players shouldn't be focusing on i.e Sponsorship Opportunities or Finding scrims.

We are looking for someone who has a talent for writing and working with people.

In this position you will be doing write ups for our Social media accounts regarding recent news with the organisation, Doing sponsorship write ups in which you be promoting the organisation to potential sponsors.

Our league section of the Organisation currently has 2 of the top 30 challenger ranked 5v5 teams in OCE both with impressive win rates.

If you are interested in this opportunity please email me at paragonesportslol@gmail.com with your application.

Thanks.

replies.body: I would apply, but I got no experience. :(
